name: chat
description: Application chat message in realtime with socket.io and express

scripts.start: browserify controllers/webrtc.js -o controllers/webrtcFine.js && browserify public/js/getImages.js -o public/js/getImagesFine.js && browserify public/js/socket.js -o public/js/socketFine.js && nodemon -e css,ejs,js,json --watch index
